text:
Due to the Administration's investments, a safe & effective coronavirus vaccine is looking promising.

With 2 vaccine candidates entering the final stage of trials, the White House is preparing to start mass production & prepping the military for distribution once it's available.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
